CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.randomKey = _DataService:GetTable("SOSkeyData") self.uiSOSbox = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SOSgame/SOSbasebox/SOSbox") self.uiSOSgame = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SOSgame") self.LastBtn = self.uiSOSbox:GetChildByName("RandomBtn_116") self.failPopup = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SOSfailPopup") self.sucessPopup = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SOSsucessPopup") self.uiRules = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SOSgameRules") self.map5 = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map05") self.uiSOStimer = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SOSgame/SOSbasebox/SOStimer") self.SOSredBtn = {15, 19, 23, 27, 29, 31, 33, 35, 37, 40, 44, 46, 48, 54, 57, 59, 62, 68, 70, 72, 76, 79, 81, 83, 85, 87, 89, 93, 97, 101} self:AgainSetting()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SOSsetting
CodeBlockMethod.Code: for i = 0, 116 do self.SOSbtn = self.uiSOSbox:GetChildByName("RandomBtn_"..tostring(i)) if self.SOSbtn ~= nil then self.SOSbtn.TextComponent.Text = self.randomKey:GetCell(math.random(1, 5), "key") end self:SetBeginColor(i) end self:SOSgame()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: wrongKey
CodeBlockMethod.Code: for i = num, self.current - 1 do self.SOSbtn = self.uiSOSbox:GetChildByName("RandomBtn_"..tostring(math.floor(i))) if self.SOSbtn ~= nil then self.SOSbtn.TextComponent.Text = self.randomKey:GetCell(math.random(1, 5), "key") end self:SetBeginColor(i) end self.current = num self:SOSgame()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: FailPopup
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.failPopup.Enable == false and self.sucess == false then self.failPopup.Enable = true self.TimerScript.GameStart = false --self.current = 0 end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SucessPopup
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.sucessPopup.Enable == false then self.sucessPopup.Enable = true self.sucess = true self.LastSucess = true end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetBeginColor
CodeBlockMethod.Code: for _,v in pairs(self.SOSredBtn) do if v == math.floor(num) then self.SOSbtn.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color(0, 0.027, 1, 1) break else self.SOSbtn.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color(0.41, 0.41, 0.41, 1) end end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: AgainSetting
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self:SOSsetting() self.fail = false self.sucess = false --self.GoFail = false self.current = 0 self.TimerScript.time = 60 self.uiRules.Enable = false self.uiSOStimer.TextComponent.Text = "01:00"

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if Environment:IsPlay() == true then if self.uiSOSgame.Enable == true and self.failPopup.Enable == false and self.uiRules.Enable == false then if key == KeyboardKey.LeftArrow then key = "←" elseif key == KeyboardKey.UpArrow then key = "↑" elseif key == KeyboardKey.DownArrow then key = "↓" elseif key == KeyboardKey.RightArrow then key = "→" elseif key == KeyboardKey.Space then key = "S" else key = "" end if self.SOSbtn ~= nil then if key == self.SOSbtn.TextComponent.Text then for _,v in pairs(self.SOSredBtn) do if v == math.floor(self.current) then self.SOSbtn.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.red break else self.SOSbtn.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white end end self.SOSbtn.TextComponent.Text = "" self:UpCurrent() self:SOSgame() if self.TimerScript.count == true and self.LastBtn.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color == Color.white then self:SucessPopup() self.TimerScript.count = false end else if self.current >= 4 then self:wrongKey(self.current - 4) else self:wrongKey(0) end
end end end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- 첫 시작 랜덤 키 세팅 local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.uiSOSgame.Enable == false then self.uiSOSgame.Enable = true self:SOSsetting() --self.map5.SoundComponent:Pause() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent2
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- 첫 키 누르면 게임 시작 local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if Environment:IsPlay() == true then if self.uiSOSgame.Enable == true and self.uiRules.Enable == false then if math.floor(self.current) == 1 and self.fail == false then --self.map5.SoundComponent.AudioClipRUID = "2de176cd6a9f496caf8c2bd06e961838" --self.map5.SoundComponent.Loop = true --self.map5.SoundComponent:Play() self.TimerScript.GameStart = true self.TimerScript.count = true self.fail = true wait(60) if self.LastSucess == false then self:FailPopup() end self.LastSucess = false end end if self.uiSOSgame.Enable == true then _UserService.LocalPlayer.MovementComponent.Enable = false end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent2
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- 실패 팝업 OK -- 실패시 다시 게임 세팅 local Entity = event.Entity ------------------------------------------------------- self.current = 0 if self.failPopup.Enable == true then self.failPopup.Enable = false self:AgainSetting() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent3
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- 성공 팝업 OK local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- _UserService.LocalPlayer.MovementComponent.Enable = true if self.sucessPopup.Enable == true then self.uiSOSgame.Enable = false --self.map5.SoundComponent:Pause() --self.map5.SoundComponent.AudioClipRUID = "2f6c3b7579d04d1297ff1f913a4788b9" --self.map5.SoundComponent.Loop = true --self.map5.SoundComponent:Play() self.sucessPopup.Enable = false self:AgainSetting() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent4
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- 실패 팝업 Cancel local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- _UserService.LocalPlayer.MovementComponent.Enable = true if self.failPopup.Enable == true and self.uiSOSgame.Enable == true then self.failPopup:SetEnable(false) self.uiSOSgame:SetEnable(false) self:AgainSetting() --self.map5.SoundComponent:Pause() --self.map5.SoundComponent.AudioClipRUID = "2f6c3b7579d04d1297ff1f913a4788b9" --self.map5.SoundComponent.Loop = true --self.map5.SoundComponent:Play() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent5
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- 성공 팝업 Cancel local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- _UserService.LocalPlayer.MovementComponent.Enable = true if self.sucessPopup.Enable == true and self.uiSOSgame.Enable ==true then self.sucessPopup:SetEnable(false) self.uiSOSgame:SetEnable(false) --self.map5.SoundComponent:Pause() --self.map5.SoundComponent.AudioClipRUID = "2f6c3b7579d04d1297ff1f913a4788b9" --self.map5.SoundComponent.Loop = true --self.map5.SoundComponent:Play() self:AgainSetting() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent6
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.uiRules.Enable == false then self.uiRules.Enable = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent7
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.uiRules.Enable == true then self.uiRules.Enable = false end
